name: MELTED (Pizza_Gamer)
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the BenBonk Game Jam

You are a slippery ice cube in a castle, who is trying to collect 20 coins (don't search to hard, the coins are pretty easy to find) but due to the warmth you start to melt. The only way to reset the melting, is by hiting the ice zones on the TWO SIDES of the screen. HAVE FUN!!!

z/w/up arrow/space - jump (hold for higher jump)

q/a/left arrow - left

d/right arrow - right

https://itch.io/jam/benbonk-game-jam-3
